xtc.lang.blink
Class SymbolMapper

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.blink.SymbolMapper

public class SymbolMapper
extends Object

A symbol remapper class. This is to handle symbol remapping in the Jeannie source code. For instance, "y" in Jeannie source code could be access by "pcEnv->y" in the gdb. Therefore, we need a symbol remapping for the Jeannie source code.
